input.label: Keywords
input.name: keywords
input.sample: water tank, 2 in 1, harvest rainwater, water butt, planter cup on top, integrated thread
input.placeholder: Specify which keywords should the product short description be based on

data.output: This 2 in 1 Water Tank lets you harvest your rainwater in style! The 2 in 1 capability harvests rainwater from your downpipes and collects it from the plant-cup top. The modern finish allows this water butt to be the feature of any garden, whilst making the most of the rainwater. This water butt comes with an integrated thread, making it easy for you to connect the tap. The planter cup in the top is removable to make planting as easy as possible and allow you to customize your water butt, whilst also allowing the inside of the tank to be cleaned regularly.

data.output: Available for sale is the Ryan Stegman 1:50 Variant of Hulk vs. Thor: Banner of War Alpha #1 graded by CGC in 9.6 NM+ conditions. According to the CGC Census, this is the only copy of this ratio variant to be graded, making it a true one-of-a-kind (for the moment). Add this hard-to-find comic to your collection today!

data.output: Robyn the Octopus knitting kit is so tactile, his tentacles wrap around and give a real good cuddle. Though appealing to children and adults alike, his tiny tentacles and perfect for little hands to hold. We are proud to be working with a local Yorkshire mill to produce our very own Beau Baby DK yarn. Our Baby Beau yarn is a mixture of 50% merino and 50% acrylic. It's super soft and also machine washable.
